MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G21 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Ayr Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.48pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Flemington Street substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.06pm on Saturday 6th February 2021.
